title: Crossing the Line
description: In this Dateline classic, after a fatal car crash, investigators find a series of revealing text messages that lead them to believe it may not have been an accident. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on November 11, 2011.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
